content.prompt_es: Choose the correct option to complete the sentences about reported speech.
content.explanation: En el discurso indirecto, usamos el verbo 'told' para indicar lo que alguien dijo.
content.stimulus_en: He said, 'I want to go to the park.' He _____ that he wanted to go to the park.

content.prompt_es: She asked, 'Where are you going?' She _____ where I was going.
content.explanation: Cuando reportamos preguntas, usamos 'asked' para la forma indirecta.

content.prompt_es: Choose the correct option to complete the sentences about reported speech.
content.explanation: En el discurso indirecto, usamos 'said' con el contenido de la declaración inicial.
content.stimulus_en: He said, 'I will call you tomorrow.' He _____ that he would call me the next day.

content.prompt_es: Choose the correct option to complete the sentences about reported speech.
content.explanation: Usamos 'said' para reportar afirmaciones en el discurso indirecto.
content.stimulus_en: They said, 'We are happy.' They _____ that they were happy.

content.prompt_es: Choose the correct option to complete the sentences about reported speech.
content.explanation: Usamos 'told' cuando indicamos a alguien que haga algo.
content.stimulus_en: She told me, 'You must study harder.' She _____ me that I had to study harder.

content.prompt_es: What is a common method to reduce waste in our daily lives?
content.explanation: Reciclar es un método común para reducir los desechos y fomentar la sostenibilidad.

content.prompt_es: Which gas is mainly responsible for climate change?
content.explanation: El dióxido de carbono es un gas de efecto invernadero que contribuye al cambio climático.

content.prompt_es: What natural resource is essential for all living things?
content.explanation: El agua es un recurso natural esencial para la vida en la Tierra.

content.prompt_es: What is the term for the variety of plant and animal life in a particular habitat?
content.explanation: La biodiversidad se refiere a la variedad de vida en un hábitat específico.

content.prompt_es: What can we do to protect endangered species?
content.explanation: Conservar sus hábitats es crucial para proteger las especies en peligro de extinción.

content.prompt_es:
Complete the sentences by changing the form of the given word.

Base words: (1) DEVELOP, (2) INTEREST, (3) COURSE, (4) COMMUNICATE, (5) GRADUATE
content.main_text: Education is very important for personal (1)___. Different people have different (2)___. Schools and universities offer various (3)___ to help students learn. Good (4)___ skills are essential for success in any field. After finishing (5)___, students often continue their education in different ways.
content.explanation:
(1) La palabra 'development' es el sustantivo de 'develop', que significa el proceso de crecer o cambiar.
(2) La forma plural de 'interest' se usa para mostrar que cada persona puede tener más de un interés.
(3) La forma plural 'courses' se usa para referirse a más de una materia o clases ofrecidas.
(4) El sustantivo 'communication' se refiere al acto de comunicarse, relacionado con las habilidades de comunicación.
(5) La palabra 'graduation' se refiere al evento de completar un curso de estudio, relacionada con 'graduate'.
